title: #87: Medical Fascism & Authoritarian Fantasies | Harry Vox
description:
For the past 25 years, Harry Vox has been in the trenches reporting on our quickly collapsing society and outrageous government overreach programs. The insanity of 2020 did not come as a surprise to Harry Vox.

An understanding of the medical mafia that runs Big Pharma helps to fill in the gaps of why certain policy decisions are being made, who is actually calling the shots, and what we can do to break free from their control.

Who is really in power and where is the money coming from? When is this operation going to end? What does society look like in the aftermath? Harry Vox has some thoughts on these questions and much more.
